data.name: Fractured Space - Commander Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Commander Pack is the ultimate value pack for new and existing Fractured Space players


The Commander Pack includes:

  • Exclusive Ultimate Skin - Azrael Reaper
  • TDS Ship - Reaper
  • Legendary Captain Evan Sterling
  • Premium Drop Ship (25)
  • 2,000 platinum
  • Credit Booster (100)
  • 75,000 DNA

    Ultimate Skins give +20% Credit bonus in all games

data.short_description: The Commander Pack is the ultimate value pack for new and existing Fractured Space players

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1 (must have KB 2670838 installed) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 3.40 GHz
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
